subject: Your loan is pre-approved  Thu, 26 Apr 2007 21:56:16 -0800
body:
Dear Homeowner

Are you tired of paying high interest rates?. Act NOW to receive your pre-approved loan.

You can receive $267,000 for 
$595 per month.

Please respond A.S.A.P.
http://ilook.tw/hegr


 
 

Wallace Faris
Trust Loan


Lots of times you have to pretend to join a parade in which you're not really interested in order to get where you're going.	-Christopher Darlington Morley (1890-1957)
